name: European Federation of Bottled Waters
legal: International not for profit association under Belgian law (aisbl)
goal:
EFBW is the voice of the European bottled water industry. Through its membership base of national trade associations and direct company members, EFBW represents over 550 producers of natural mineral and spring waters.
EFBW promotes natural mineral and spring waters as the best source of natural and healthy hydration. Its statutory purposes include: representation of the interests of the bottled water industry before European and international institutions and other relevant stakeholders; identification of issues likely to affect members and development of solutions with due regard to the industry’s diversity; promotion of good manufacturing practices, encouragement of socially responsible and sustainable management practices, promotion of the industry’s role with respect to source and environment protection.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
